data.snapshot: Price is down ~2.3% from the open and sits just above the short SMA8 but below the SMA21; RSI ~39 shows mild bearish momentum. A sweep occurred without a volume spike, suggesting a shallow stop-hunt rather than strong distribution.
chronology: Price rolled over to a low of $112,176.16
Price is slightly above SMA8 (112,627) but below SMA21 (112,999)
Sweep detected (stop-hunt) without accompanying volume spike
Max intraday drop ~2.67% from local highs
technicalReadout: Price > SMA8 but < SMA21 — short-term support, mid-term resistance
No volume spike — current move lacks strong conviction
Sweep flagged — possible stop-loss clearing around the low
MaxDropPct 2.67% — recent pullback size is limited
LowerHighs = false — trend structure hasn't confirmed a series of lower highs

scenarios.title: Shallow pullback and rebound
scenarios.text: If price holds above SMA8 and reclaims SMA21 (~112,999) with increased volume, expect a mean-reversion bounce toward recent highs; RSI recovery above 50 would add confirmation.

scenarios.title: Bear continuation
scenarios.text: Failure to hold the recent low (~112,176)—especially on rising volume—would likely extend selling pressure and open room for a deeper test of lower ranges under 112k.

scenarios.title: False sweep then volatile reversal
scenarios.text: The sweep could have cleared stops; a sudden volume pickup and quick move back above SMA21 would signal a short-squeeze style reversal and a fast recovery toward mid-term levels.

checklist: For demand zone longs (~109k): wait for a bullish reaction candle + above‑average buy volume; stop under 107k.
For H&S shorts: wait for a retest of ~112–112.5k that fails and shows rejection volume; reduce size into expiries.
If price closes daily above 118k with volume, reconsider bearish sizing and prefer bullish setups.
Keep position sizing modest (1–2% capital per trade) — the structure is still corrective and volatile.
